title: Astroboy 09
creator_credit: Tezuka Productions, Hidehiko Takei and Satoshi Yamamoto
brief_description: Three episodes in the adventures of the boy robot created by Osamu Tezuka. The titles are: ‘The Liar robot’, “Blackie Young’ and ‘Goliath’s head”.
